trans-unit.source: A secure and interoperable binding that derives from <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WS2007HttpBinding"></xref> and supports federated security.
trans-unit.target: En sikker og brukes sammen binding som er avledet fra <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WS2007HttpBinding"> </xref> og støtter sammenslått sikkerhet.

trans-unit.source: Federation is the ability to share identities across multiple enterprises or trust domains for authentication and authorization.
trans-unit.target: Sammenslåingen er muligheten til å dele identiteter på tvers av flere selskaper eller klarering domener for godkjenning og godkjenning.

trans-unit.source: It uses the WS-Trust protocol to map the identity representation from one trust domain to another.
trans-unit.target: Den bruker WS-Trust-protokollen til å tilordne identity-representasjon fra en klarert domene til en annen.

trans-unit.source: Federated HTTP binding supports SOAP security as well as mixed-mode security, but it does not support transport security.
trans-unit.target: Samlet HTTP-binding støtter SOAP sikkerhet, samt blandet modus sikkerhet, men det støtter ikke transportsikkerhet.

trans-unit.source: Services configured with this binding must use the HTTP transport.
trans-unit.target: Tjenester som er konfigurert med denne bindingen, må bruke HTTP-transport.

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[crdefault](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]<xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpBinding>.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[crdefault](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]<xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpBinding>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpBinding>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > When calling a [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] service built with.Net Framework 4.0 from a WCF client application built with [!INCLUDE[netfx35_short](~/add/includes/netfx35-short-md.md)] or earlier, the configuration file generated by svcutil.exe or adding a service reference from [!INCLUDE[vsprvs](~/add/includes/vsprvs-md.md)] will contain the establishSecurityContext attribute in the binding configuration.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Når du kaller en [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] service bygges with.Net Framework 4.0 fra en WCF-klientprogrammet bygget med [!INCLUDE[netfx35_short](~/add/includes/netfx35-short-md.md)] eller tidligere, konfigurasjonsfilen genereres ved svcutil.exe eller legge til en referansen fra [!INCLUDE[vsprvs](~/add/includes/vsprvs-md.md)] inneholder attributtet establishSecurityContext i bindingskonfigurasjonen av.

trans-unit.source: This attribute is not recognized by the [!INCLUDE[netfx35_short](~/add/includes/netfx35-short-md.md)] runtime and the application will thrown an <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException> with the message "Unrecognized attribute establishSecurityContext".
trans-unit.target: Dette attributtet gjenkjennes ikke av den [!INCLUDE[netfx35_short](~/add/includes/netfx35-short-md.md)] runtime og programmet vil utløst et <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException>med meldingen "Ukjent attributt establishSecurityContext".</xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException>

trans-unit.source: To workaround this problem, remove the establishSecurityContext attribute from the binding configuration.
trans-unit.target: Å løse dette problemet ved å fjerne attributtet establishSecurityContext fra bindingskonfigurasjonen.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WS2007FederationHttpBinding"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WS2007FederationHttpBinding"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: The details of these settings are available from the instance of <xref:System.ServiceModel.FederatedMessageSecurityOverHttp> that is returned by the <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurity.Message%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Detaljene for disse innstillingene er tilgjengelig fra forekomsten av <xref:System.ServiceModel.FederatedMessageSecurityOverHttp>som er returnert av den <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurity.Message%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurity.Message%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.FederatedMessageSecurityOverHttp>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WS2007FederationHttpBinding"></xref> class with a specified type of security used by the binding.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WS2007FederationHttpBinding"> </xref> klassen med en angitt type sikkerhet bindingen.

trans-unit.source: The default value of <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurityMode> is <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurityMode> which specifies that integrity, confidentiality, and server and client authentication are provided using SOAP message security.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien for <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurityMode>er <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurityMode>som angir at integritet, konfidensiell, og serveren og klientprogrammene godkjenning leveres sikkerhet for SOAP-melding.</xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurityMode> </xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurityMode>

trans-unit.source: The details of these settings are available from the instance of <xref:System.ServiceModel.FederatedMessageSecurityOverHttp> that is returned by the <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurity.Message%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Detaljene for disse innstillingene er tilgjengelig fra forekomsten av <xref:System.ServiceModel.FederatedMessageSecurityOverHttp>som er returnert av den <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurity.Message%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurity.Message%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.FederatedMessageSecurityOverHttp>

trans-unit.source: The value of <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurityMode"></xref> that specifies the type of security that is used with the SOAP message and for the client.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurityMode"> </xref> som angir hvilken type sikkerhet som brukes med SOAP-melding og for klienten.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WS2007FederationHttpBinding"></xref> class with a binding specified by its configuration name.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WS2007FederationHttpBinding"> </xref> klassen med en binding som er angitt i konfigurasjonsnavnet.

trans-unit.source: The binding configuration name for the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Configuration.WS2007HttpBindingElement"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Navnet på bindingen konfigurasjonen for den <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Configuration.WS2007HttpBindingElement"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The binding element with the name configurationName was not found.
trans-unit.target: Bindingselement med navnet configurationName ble ikke funnet.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WS2007FederationHttpBinding"></xref> class with a specified type of security used by the binding and a value that indicates whether a reliable session is enabled.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WS2007FederationHttpBinding"> </xref> klassen med en angitt type sikkerhet bindingen og en verdi som angir om en pålitelig økt er aktivert.

trans-unit.source: The value of <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurityMode"></xref> that specifies the type of security that is used with the SOAP message and for the client.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurityMode"> </xref> som angir hvilken type sikkerhet som brukes med SOAP-melding og for klienten.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if a reliable session is enabled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis en pålitelig økt er aktivert. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Creates a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityBindingElement> using the settings provided by this instance.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityBindingElement>med innstillinger som er angitt i denne forekomsten.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityBindingElement>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityBindingElement> using the settings provided by this instance.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityBindingElement>med innstillinger som er angitt i denne forekomsten.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityBindingElement>
